unnormalised: Entertainment Buzz: Film Festivals are Where it's At, Yaar!
normalised: Entertainment Buzz: Film Festivals are Where it's At, Yaar!

unnormalised: Forget binge-watching for a sec, film festivals are having a MOMENT! From Cannes to Kerala, the indie scene is exploding. Word is, loads of desi filmmakers are hitting the international circuit this year.
normalised: Forget binge-watching for a second, film festivals are having a MOMENT! From Cannes to Kerala, the indie scene is exploding. Word is, loads of desi filmmakers are hitting the international circuit this year.

unnormalised: Heard whispers that Anurag Kashyap might be premiering something new at the Toronto Film Festival – fingers crossed! Meanwhile, back home, the Kolkata Film Festival is gearing up for its biggest year yet, promising a smorgasbord of regional and international cinema.
normalised: Heard whispers that Anurag Kashyap might be premiering something new at the Toronto Film Festival – fingers crossed! Meanwhile, back home, the Kolkata Film Festival is gearing up for its biggest year yet, promising a smorgasbord of regional and international cinema.

unnormalised: And for those who missed the memo, Onam's around the corner, which means the International Film Festival of Kerala (IFFK) is probably already planning its schedule. Imagine, watching arthouse flicks while munching on a plate of spicy Kerala biryani... pure bliss!
normalised: And for those who missed the memo, Onam's around the corner, which means the International Film Festival of Kerala (I F F K) is probably already planning its schedule. Imagine, watching arthouse flicks while munching on a plate of spicy Kerala biryani... pure bliss!

unnormalised: Seems like everyone's chasing that Golden Lion or Palme d'Or, but honestly, just discovering fresh talent is prize enough. So, ditch the Netflix for a weekend and support some independent cinema – you might just find your new favorite director!
normalised: Seems like everyone's chasing that Golden Lion or Palme d'Or, but honestly, just discovering fresh talent is prize enough. So, ditch the Netflix for a weekend and support some independent cinema – you might just find your new favorite director!
